FuncDef: The display ospf spf-statistics command displays route calculation statistics in OSPF processes. The display ospf spf-statistics command displays route calculation statistics in OSPF processes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an OSPF process.
If no process ID is specified, this command displays brief information about route calculation statistics in all processes.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 4294967295.
